import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from "react"; import "./CandidatesDashboardStyles.css"; import contact from "../../Assets/contact.png" import attendance from "../../Assets/leaves.png" import employees from "../../Assets/employees.png" import logout from "../../Assets/logout.png" import leaves from "../../Assets/leaves.png" import AddNewCandidate from "./AddNewCandidate"; const Sidebar = ()=>{ return(
LOGO

) } export default Sidebar;
